entry.title: Crystal Choro LED Ceiling Lamp
entry.summary:
Vendor: Coral Tree
Type: Ceiling Lamp
Price: 2450.00

Imagine the enchanting dance of LED light as it reflects and refracts through each crystal, casting a kaleidoscope of colors across your ceiling and walls. It's like bringing a touch of magic into your home with every flick of the switch.

1. The product includes 1 ceiling lamp.
2. The size of the product is (6x6x39 inches) or (15x15x100 cms).
3. The weight of the product is 400 gm.
4. The material of the shade is glass & base is metal & acrylic.
5. The length of the wire is 15cm .
6. String light comes fixed inside the lampshade.
7. Wipe with a soft cloth. Dust occasionally.

4. The material of the shade is glass & base is metal.
